name: DisMala
description:
Carey Wells, a withdrawn and introverted high school senior, has been struggling to care about her everyday life ever since her older sister went missing one year ago. Exhausted from dealing with her declining grades, lack of genuine friendships, and worsening home life, she starts retreating into a recurring daydream to find relief. 

Artwork: Kea Pedersen

Writing: Clayton Sisson & Kyra Zimmermann

Code: Kyra Zimmermann, Clayton Sisson, Kea Pedersen

Sound Design: Kea Pedersen & Clayton Sisson
